# ABPersonBirthdayProperty

**Global Variable**

The person’s birthday. Value is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSDateComponents] object.

## Declaration

```swift
let ABPersonBirthdayProperty: String
```

## Constants

- **ABPersonNamePrefixProperty**: The name prefix. Value is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSString] object.
- **ABPersonGivenNameProperty**: The person’s given name. Value is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSString] object.
- **ABPersonMiddleNameProperty**: The person’s middle name. Value is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSString] object.
- **ABPersonFamilyNameProperty**: The person’s family name. Value is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSString] object.
- **ABPersonNameSuffixProperty**: The name suffix. Value is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSString] object.
- **ABPersonPreviousFamilyNameProperty**: The person’s previous family name. Value is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSString] object.
- **ABPersonNicknameProperty**: The person’s nickname. Value is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSString] object.
- **ABPersonPhoneticGivenNameProperty**: The person’s phonetic given name. Value is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSString] object.
- **ABPersonPhoneticMiddleNameProperty**: The person’s phonetic middle name. Value is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSString] object.
- **ABPersonPhoneticFamilyNameProperty**: The person’s phonetic family name. Value is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSString] object.
- **ABPersonOrganizationNameProperty**: The person’s organization name. Value is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSString] object.
- **ABPersonDepartmentNameProperty**: The person’s department name. Value is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSString] object.
- **ABPersonJobTitleProperty**: The person’s job title. Value is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSString] object.
- **ABPersonNoteProperty**: The note for the person. Value is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSString] object.
- **ABPersonPhoneNumbersProperty**: The person’s phone numbers. Value is an array of labeled values with phone number values.
